title: Error in Gifting skins to friends
body:
Hi, My name is Masterfre and I've been a league of legends player for several years now and I just came across this weird notification from when my friend xDingbat was trying to gift me a mystery skin of Dragon Blade Riven.  It said that we haven't been friends for long enough, but im postive we've been friends for several months now. I should know because I also attend school with him and we talk about playing together frequently. Please help me to resolve this problem. 

Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey,

Thanks for letting us know.  Was this on the OCE or NA server?

We're looking into a potential issue with this on OCE at the moment.

Cheers
Mindstar
Should be fixed - give it another try and let me know how you go :)
Has this been pushed to the NA client as well? Some people over there were having that issue and I want to have an answer for them.
